definitions.definition: Any bird within the genus Chloris (formerly a subset of the genus Carduelis ), small passerine songbirds with yellow-green plumage, found throughout Europe and Asia.

subdefinitions.definition: European greenfinch , a common Old World finch ( Chloris chloris , syn. Carduelis chloris ), mainly green with yellow in the wings and tail.

definitions.definition: A female member of the Ulster Defence Regiment .

subdefinitions.definition: A female member of the Royal Irish Regiment .
subdefinitions.label_groups: UK military slang , by extension , informal

main_definition: Any bird within the genus Chloris (formerly a subset of the genus Carduelis ), small passerine songbirds with yellow-green plumage, found throughout Europe and Asia.
secondary_definitions: ( Northern Ireland , historical , informal ) A female member of the Ulster Defence Regiment .
